title: What's the cost for dental braces in the Dominican Republic? - Quora

response.answer_text: Cost have largely been reduced over the past few years, so now you would pay somewhere around 20000 pesos that's about $500 American dollars.  Quality is great and compete with any other country.  Although can a large sum, they provide payment plans based on the required visits you will have as to avoid having to pay everything up front.

just like United States it solely depends on the orthodontist reputation and expertise, but if there is one thing I know is that it doesn't even compare to the cost here in America. It varies from 50,000-100,000
